details: SULPHUROUS ACID, (tonsillitis (as a spray), acne rosacea, ULCERATIVE STOMATITIS, pityriasis versicolor).

Head: Ringing in ears
Anxious, furious, disposed to fight
Headache better by vomiting
Respiratory: Persistent choking cough with copious expectoration

name: Sulphurosum acidum
dosage: As a spray in tonsillitis. According to Ringer, ten to fifteen minims taken ten minutes before each meal will remedy pyrosis and prevent fermentation and flatulence. It also removes thrus. Homeopathically, third attenuation.
